channel.title: QuickPoll Feature preview
channel.description: This website's goal is to show you what our next Web application 'QuickPoll' will be able to do for you. Are you a teacher ? You will be able to gather information from your audience in no time!

item.title: Create your first poll
item.description:
Our first preview will focus on creating your first poll.

First of all, give it a name!

As an example, this question is automatically included:

For each question, you can specify:

  • Its name
  • Its options:
    • If you allow anonymous voting
    • The total number of votes each user can cast
    • A timeout which determines the amount of time the question will be displayed (in seconds)
  • A list of possible answers

All you have to do now is create it!

item.title: Welcome!
item.description:
This blog will keep you updated on our upcoming product: QuickPoll

With it, you’ll be able to dynamize your talks like never before - and with ease!

Gathering information from your audience can be tricky - or even painful -, that’s for sure. Our easy to use service will let you create a poll, and for each question, specify multiple answers.

During your presentation, simply go the the next question and get immediate participation.

What is needed is what everyone has in this new digital era: a Web enabled smartphone.

Stay tuned for more updates!
